channel.title: Please read
channel.description:
hello everyone, i am the coder of my friends server and i need some help, i was woundering if anyone could tell me what file i have to go into to make a weapon equiped as a 2h sword and what code i need to input.
thank you.

item.title: Please read
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You go into either Item.java, or if you have it, Item4.java and then insert the weaponâ€™s ID into the 2handed spot. Also make sure you remove the ID from the original place first.

Read full topic
